main event: On March 7, 1967, a witness observed a bright circular object with a greenish-blue glow hovering over Youngstown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be an aircraft but was determined to be a disc-shaped UFO,The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes before the object moved out of view,The witness, a 27-year-old salesman, reported the sighting to the local police department,No unusual sounds were heard during the observation,The case remains unresolved with insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: circular, disc-shaped object with a greenish-blue glow
witness description: a 27-year-old white male, employed as a salesman, with no previous UFO sightings
